import styles from "./Tarjetas.module.css" import iconoCerrar from "./CloseIcon.png" import iconoEditar from "./EditIcon.png" import { useState } from "react" function Tarjeta({capa, videoURL}){ const [reproduciendo, setReproduciendo] = useState(false); const manejandoElVideo = () => { setReproduciendo(true); } return(
{!reproduciendo}
) } export default Tarjeta
